The claim was supported by unnamed contr: 2. The tech blog Gizmodo reported that Facebook's curation process favored credible sources rather than specifically liberal ones.
A former journalist who worked on the pr: 4. Several former Facebook "news curators" revealed that they were instructed to artificially inject selected stories into the trending news module, even if they weren't popular or trending. They were also directed not to include news about Facebook itself in the trending module.
